title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.9 - Disputes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.9 - Disputes

State Regulations

In the event a dispute between the division and the
ticket bearer occurs as to whether the ticket is a winning ticket, and if no
prize is paid, the commission may, solely at the option of the commission, replace the disputed ticket with an unplayed ticket (or a ticket of equivalent
sales price from any other current instant lottery game). This remedy shall be
the sole and exclusive remedy of the bearer of the ticket. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5006.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
